message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"airport","sentence":"我们在机场。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation scene of three people standing together on an airport runway. The airport terminal is visible in the background, with large glass windows and a few scattered suitcases nearby. Airplanes can be seen parked behind the group, and the sky is overcast with swirling, misty clouds. The people look thoughtful and calm, and the scene is bathed in muted pastel colors, giving a post-apocalyptic yet soft, hopeful tone.","sentence_translation":"We are at the airport."}
